Software Publishers Report Only Modest Increases in Earnings Due to Seasonal Slowdown and Lack of New Products
Software publishers across the world are reporting only modest increases in earnings this quarter. While the industry has been growing at an unprecedented pace over the last decade, the current economic climate is proving challenging, with seasonal slowdowns and lack of new products being
